about_the_game:
Time's Prison is a first-person game. It is a game of searching for treasure on a deserted island by passing various adventure and puzzle tracks. It is the first game of Haldur game.

A pirate who is burning with love for treasure finally finds the treasure island on the map.
While approaching the island with his boat, a cannonball that suddenly comes sinks his boat. The pirate ship swims towards the island while it is near the island.
However, the pirate has puzzles to solve and adventures to go through. The story of the game starts right here.

There are two ghosts on the island. These ghosts show that the island is cursed. It is a very dangerous and cursed island for the pirate.
He tries to reach the treasure by moving forward on this island and passing through difficult paths in search of the treasure.

This game was made by two people in our spare time in two months. It is the first activity of our company.
We would be happy to see your positive opinions about our game in your comments.

Thank you.

name: Time's Prison

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750TI or equivalent, integrated graphics not supported
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent, integrated graphics not supported
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
